mapper.select: select count(a.m) cusNum,a.m mdate from (select FROM_UNIXTIME(createtime/1000,'%Y%m') m from cus_customer where createtime > #{starttime} AND createtime < #{endtime}) a group by a.m

select a.id,a.name,ifnull(b.num,0) manNum,ifnull(c.leaveNum,0) leaveNum,ifnull(d.birthdayNum,0) birthdayNum from man_dept a left join (select deptid,count(id) num from man_emp where state=0 group by deptid) b on a.id=b.deptid left join (select b.deptid,count(0) leaveNum from man_apply a left join man_emp b on a.uid=b.id where a.starttime < #{ctime} AND a.endtime > #{ctime} group by b.deptid) c on a.id=c.deptid left join (select deptid, count(0) birthdayNum from man_emp WHERE state=0 AND FROM_UNIXTIME(birthday/1000,'%m')=#{cmonth} group by deptid) d on a.id=d.deptid
select a.*,b.name from (select managerid,progressid,count(0) num from prj_project group by managerid,progressid) a left join man_emp b on a.managerid=b.id
